item.description:
Colombian singer, percussionist, songwriter and arranger Gregorio Uribe brings his Colombian Big Band to perform the very best from his original compositions and arrangements. Gregorio Uribe's show is the first of a series of four FREE concerts in O'Day Park on four consecutive Thursdays throughout the rest of July.

Check it out!! We'll be able to kick back in the park so bring your friends, a picnic dinner, a blanket, lawn chairs and, of course, your dancing shoes!! O'Day Park is just a few blocks walking distance from the Copely Square T.

Gregorio Uribe y Su Orquesta combines the line-up used in the older Colombian bands, such as those bands of Lucho Bermúdez and Pacho Galán, with a fresh sound where influences of different styles can be heard. With 15 musicians (3 trumpets, 3 trombones, 4 saxes and the rhythm section) they produce a great dance vibe of energetic rhythms and subtle harmonies.
item.name: GREGORIO URIBE O'Day Park (FREE)
